amendment.description: To strike the prohibition on political appointees being involved in the approval of queries by the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1834 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 17 - 75. Record Vote Number: 145.

action.text: Amendment SA 1834 proposed by Senator Marshall.
